name: Thomas McDONOUGH, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: McDonough v. Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia

parties: Thomas McDONOUGH, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of June, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Application for an Immediate Hearing and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
118 A.3d 384
Thomas McDONOUGH, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.
No. 51 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 29, 2015.
